title:
Star News -- please help!



My family is coming to Wilmington for Thanksgiving, and we want to go OUT to eat.  What are our options? Who serves Thanksgiving dinner in the Wilmington area?



Thanks!
text:
On Tuesday, food reporter Liz Biro will be posting this type of
information on PortCityFoodies.com, our food blog. She's compiling
that info now so please check the site on Tuesday.

Thanks!
